<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Azarketi Purification](/Feats.aspx?ID=2305) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 14 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

You can cast [_purify food and drink_](/Spells.aspx?ID=241) as a primal innate spell, but only on liquids. You can cast this spell once every 10 minutes. You can also use your innate _purify food and drink_ on a touched creature instead of a liquid to purify their blood, giving that creature a +2 status bonus for 1 minute on their ongoing saves against [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) already present in their body when you cast the spell.
name: Azarketi Purification
